name: Fast Climber
description:
Welcome to the Fast Climber Game !

Controls :
This game have special control you will see this if you play the game ;)

In this game you need to be vey fast ! (if you want to win)

Rules :
Some Black spheres spawn to the screen  and you need to be fast for climbing before the end of the timer !

Share you're Best score in comments and

we will add you're account on this page !
